name: Future City Playgrounds
description:
Your goal in the game is to reduce the lifetime CO2 emissions of the Heritage Building by choosing retrofit scenarios. You can modify wall and roof construction materials, change windows, configure a heat pump, add solar panels and also add rooftop vegetation. Everything you do costs $$$ and you only have $10,000,000 to play with.

Just use your mouse to click around the building and discover how you can ‘play’ in this sandbox playground environment. See how much you can reduce the carbon cloud by!!

Controls Movement
  • Mouse-click the on-screen controls to move around the building.

         OR

  • Move Camera: Keys ‘A’ ‘W’ ‘S’ ‘D’  (left-up-down-right)
  • Rotate Camera: Mouse-click and move or use the arrow keys
  • Zoom Camera: Mouse scroll wheel
Select Activity
  • Click on any wall or roof area, then choose one of the circular icons in the activity bar.
See Metrics
  • Click on "Mr Heritage"

N.B: For more info/help, you can click on the ? icon at anytime in the game.

Feedback we would like at this stage
  • Are we using the correct UNITS / TERMINOLOGY / DATA REPRESENTATION
  • EASE OF USE (How easy or confusing is the experience ?)
  • FUNCTIONALITY (Does it do the kind of things you’d want it to?)
  • GENERAL COMMENTS

Have fun!
